query.statement:
SELECT AA.*, (AA.NTT + AA.M_COST) AS TOT FROM ( SELECT A.CS661_GBN AS GBN -- 계약방식 , CASE WHEN (A.DNO IS NULL OR A.DNO ='') THEN '' WHEN (SUBSTR(A.DNO,1,3) ='010' ) THEN '0' ELSE '1' END WYN -- 통신방식 , A.CS661_TEM AS TEM -- 팀코드 , VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',A.CS661_TEM),'') AS TEM_NM -- 팀 명 , A.CS661_BSU AS BSU -- 협력사 코드 , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,A.CS661_BSU),'') AS BSU_NM -- 협력사명 , A.CS661_UPN AS UPN --통합프로젝트 , A.CS661_CST AS CST --거래선 , A.CS661_PJT AS PJT -- 원프로젝트 , A.CS661_HNO AS HNO -- 호기 , A.CS661_SPT AS SPT -- 현장명 , A.CS661_MDD AS MDD --자재납품일 , A.CS661_HST AS HST_NM -- 호기상태 , A.CS661_MGSD AS MGSD -- 무상공사개시일 , A.CS661_MISD AS MISD -- 무상일반개시일 , A.CS661_UISD AS UISD -- 유상개시일 , A.CS661_UIED AS UIED -- 유상만료일 , A.CS661_CED AS CED -- 통신비 만료일 , A.DNO AS MODEM -- 모뎀번호 , A.CS661_OHD AS OHD -- ON HAND 여부 , A.CS661_DNTT AS NTT -- 누적지급액 , CASE WHEN ( COALESCE(Z7.CS657_TOT,'0') ='0' OR COALESCE(Z7.CS657_CNT,'0') ='0' ) THEN '0' ELSE ( Z7.CS657_TOT / Z7.CS657_CNT ) END AS M_COST FROM ( SELECT Z1.*, Z6.CS656_HRNO AS HRNO, Z6.CS656_DNO AS DNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST661 Z1 , SAPHEE.ZCST656 Z6 WHERE Z1.MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND Z1.MANDT = Z6.MANDT AND Z1.CS661_PJT = Z6.CS656_PJT AND Z1.CS661_HNO = Z6.CS656_HNO AND Z1.CS661_YEA = #YEAR# AND Z1.CS661_MON = #MONTH#
AND Z1.CS661_PJT = #PJT#
AND Z1.CS661_TEM = #TEM#
AND Z1.CS661_TEM IN (SELECT CODE2 AS CODE FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND LANG =#G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND DTEXT1 = #DPT#)
AND Z1.CS661_BSU = #BSU#
AND Z1.CS661_HST = #STATE#
) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST657 Z7 ON A.DNO = Z7.CS657_MNO AND Z7.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND A.CS661_YEA = Z7.CS657_YEA AND A.CS661_MON = Z7.CS657_MON ) AA
WHERE 1=1
AND AA.WYN = #WYN#
AND AA.GBN = #GBN#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
